name: Nanno, Inc.
description: Developer of an online on-demand application designed to find and book a babysitter. The company's platform allows to browse, shortlist, book, and pay babysitters as well as performs background checking of every sitter listed on the platform, enabling parents to book vetted sitters from their phone or computer and keep their children safe at home.
one_liner: Developer of an online on-demand application designed to find and book a babysitter. The company's platform allows to browse, shortlist, book, and pay babysitters as well as performs background checking of every sitter listed on the platform, enabling parents to book vetted sitters from their phone or computer and keep their children safe at home.
